column6: the Light Criminal Police Office received two suspects.  Wong Chi Pang
column8: and Hui Hung Shun 42 are Chinese residing in Poipet.------ They are accused of document fraud and not paying import tax relating to a right hand drive Toyota Alphard.------The investigation will proceed in line with the law.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/746419.html------ ------
